# plotthis

`plotthis` is an R package that is built upon `ggplot2` and other
plotting packages. It provides high-level APIs and a wide range of
options to create stunning, publication-quality plots effortlessly.

## Installation

``` r
install.packages("plotthis")
# or to install the latest version:
remotes::install_github("pwwang/plotthis")
devtools::install_github("pwwang/plotthis")
```

You can also install the package using `conda`:

    $ conda install pwwang::r-plotthis

## Gallery

[`TrendPlot`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/TrendPlot.html)

[`SpatPointsPlot`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/spatialplots.html)

![](reference/figures/spatial.png)

## Credits

`plotthis` is greatly inspired by the
[`SCP`](https://zhanghao-njmu.github.io/SCP/index.html) package, but
with the plotting functions detached from the Seurat object or
single-cell data analysis. It is designed to be more flexible and
general-purpose, and can be used for a wide range of data types and
analysis scenarios.

# Package index

## Plotting

Functions for plotting

- [`SankeyPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/sankeyplot.md)
  [`AlluvialPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/sankeyplot.md)
  : Sankey / Alluvial Plot
- [`AreaPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/AreaPlot.md)
  : Area plot
- [`BarPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/barplot.md)
  [`SplitBarPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/barplot.md)
  [`WaterfallPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/barplot.md)
  : Bar Plot
- [`BoxPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/boxviolinplot.md)
  [`ViolinPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/boxviolinplot.md)
  [`BeeswarmPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/boxviolinplot.md)
  : Box / Violin Plot
- [`ChordPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/chordplot.md)
  [`CircosPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/chordplot.md)
  : Chord / Circos plot
- [`ClustreePlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/ClustreePlot.md)
  : Clustree Plot
- [`CorPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/CorPlot.md)
  : CorPlot
- [`CorPairsPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/CorPairsPlot.md)
  : CorPairsPlot
- [`DensityPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/densityhistoplot.md)
  [`Histogram()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/densityhistoplot.md)
  : Density Plot / Histogram
- [`DimPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/dimplot.md)
  [`FeatureDimPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/dimplot.md)
  : DimPLot / FeatureDimPlot
- [`DotPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/dotplot.md)
  [`LollipopPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/dotplot.md)
  : Dot Plot / Scatter Plot / Lollipop Plot
- [`EnrichMap()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/enrichmap1.md)
  [`EnrichNetwork()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/enrichmap1.md)
  : Enrichment Map/Network
- [`GSEASummaryPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/gsea.md)
  [`GSEAPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/gsea.md) :
  GSEA plots
- [`Heatmap()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/Heatmap.md)
  : Heatmap
- [`JitterPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/jitterplot.md)
  : Jitter Plot
- [`LinePlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/LinePlot.md)
  : Line Plot
- [`ManhattanPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/ManhattanPlot.md)
  : ManhattanPlot
- [`Network()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/Network.md)
  : Network
- [`QQPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/QQPlot.md) :
  QQ plot
- [`RidgePlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/RidgePlot.md)
  : Ridge Plot
- [`PieChart()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/PieChart.md)
  : Pie Chart
- [`RadarPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/radarplot.md)
  [`SpiderPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/radarplot.md)
  : Radar plot / Spider plot
- [`RarefactionPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/RarefactionPlot.md)
  : RarefactionPlot
- [`RingPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/RingPlot.md)
  : Ring Plot
- [`ROCCurve()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/ROCCurve.md)
  : ROC curve
- [`ScatterPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/ScatterPlot.md)
  : Scatter Plot
- [`SpatImagePlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/spatialplots.md)
  [`SpatMasksPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/spatialplots.md)
  [`SpatShapesPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/spatialplots.md)
  [`SpatPointsPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/spatialplots.md)
  : Plots for spatial elements
- [`TrendPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/TrendPlot.md)
  : Trend plot
- [`VelocityPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/VelocityPlot.md)
  : Cell velocity plot
- [`VolcanoPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/VolcanoPlot.md)
  : Volcano plot
- [`WordCloudPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/WordCloudPlot.md)
  : Word Cloud Plot
- [`UpsetPlot()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/UpsetPlot.md)
  : Upset Plot
- [`VennDiagram()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/VennDiagram.md)
  : Venn diagram

## Theming

Functions for plot theming

- [`palette_this()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/palette_this.md)
  : Color palettes collected in plotthis.

- [`theme_this()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/theme_this.md)
  :

  A ggplot2 theme and palettes for plotthis Borrowed from the
  `theme_this` function in the `SCP` pipeline

- [`theme_blank()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/theme_blank.md)
  : Blank theme

- [`theme_box()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/theme_box.md)
  : Box theme

- [`show_palettes()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/show_palettes.md)
  : Show the color palettes

- [`element_textbox()`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/element_textbox.md)
  [`element_grob(`*`<element_textbox>`*`)`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/element_textbox.md)
  : Theme element that add a box to the text

## Data

Built-in data for plotting or examples

- [`enrich_example`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/enrich_example.md)
  : An example of clusterProfiler enrichment result
- [`enrich_multidb_example`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/enrich_multidb_example.md)
  : An example of clusterProfiler enrichment result with multiple
  databases
- [`gsea_example`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/gsea_example.md)
  : An example of GSEA result from fgsea package
- [`palette_list`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/palette_list.md)
  : A list of palettes for use in data visualization
- [`words_excluded`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/words_excluded.md)
  : Excluded words in keyword enrichment analysis and extraction
- [`dim_example`](https://pwwang.github.io/plotthis/reference/dim_example.md)
  : An example data for dimensionality reduction plot
